```{r tab_eventmodchange, cache=cacheon}
survmychange <- function(time, event, eventname, myfiltcrude, myfiltadj) {
  out <- data.frame(matrix(NA, ncol = 3, nrow = 6))

  colnames(out) <- c("Model", "Subgroup", eventname)

  modvarstmp <- modvars[!modvars %in% c("shf_bpsys", "shf_ras", "shf_bbl", "shf_mra")]

  out[1, 1] <- "Crude"
  out[4, 1] <- "Adjusted"

  out[1:3, 2] <- levels(pdata$treatsbp_diff)
  out[4:6, 2] <- out[1:3, 2]

  # crude
  mod <- coxph(formula(paste0(
    "Surv(", time, ", ", event, "== 'Yes') ~ treatsbp_diff"
  )),
  data = pdata %>% filter(!!enquo(myfiltcrude))
  )
  mods <- summary(mod)

  # hr + ci
  out[1:3, 3] <- c("ref", paste0(
    dF(mods$conf.int[1:2, 1], dig = 2),
    " (", dF(mods$conf.int[1:2, 3], dig = 2),
    "-", dF(mods$conf.int[1:2, 4], dig = 2), "), ",
    dF(mods$coef[1:2, 5], 3, p = TRUE)
  ))

  # adjusted
  mod <- my.coxph.mids(formula(paste0(
    "Surv(", time, ", ", event, "== 'Yes') ~ treatsbp_diff + ", paste(modvarstmp, collapse = " + ")
  )),
  data = impdata,
  subset = myfiltadj
  )

  # df the number of events minus the regression coefficients.
  # There is support for this from middle of page 149 of the book by Parmer & Machin (ISBN 0471936405)
  mods <- summary(pool(mod,
    dfcom = (mod$analyses[[1]]$nevent - length(mod$analyses[[1]]$coefficients))
  ))

  # hr + ci
  out[4:6, 3] <- c("ref", paste0(
    dF(exp(mods$estimate[1:2]), dig = 2),
    " (", dF(exp(mods$estimate[1:2] - global_z05 * mods$std.error[1:2]), dig = 2),
    "-", dF(exp(mods$estimate[1:2] + global_z05 * mods$std.error[1:2]), dig = 2), ")",
    ", ", dF(mods$p.value[1:2], 3, p = TRUE)
  ))
  return(out)
}
```

```{r tab_eventmodchangeall, cache=cacheon, dependson="tab_eventmodchange"}
cvmorthfhosp <- survmychange(
  time = "sos_outtime_hosphf", event = "sos_out_deathcvhosphf",
  eventname = "CVD/First HFH",
  myfiltcrude = changepop1,
  myfiltadj = quote(changepop1)
)

cvmort <- survmychange(
  time = "sos_outtime_death", event = "sos_out_deathcv",
  eventname = "CVD",
  myfiltcrude = changepop1,
  myfiltadj = quote(changepop1)
)

survout <- bind_cols(cvmorthfhosp, cvmort[, 3])
names(survout) <- c(
  names(cvmorthfhosp),
  names(cvmort)[3]
)

myHeader <- c(" " = 1, " " = 1, "HR (95% CI), p-value" = 2)
names(myHeader) <- c(" ", " ", "HR (95% CI), p-value")

mykable(survout,
  caption = "Asscociation between change variable and outcome in Cox analysis"
) %>%
  add_header_above(myHeader)

write.xlsx(survout, paste0("./output/tabs/eventtab_change_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE)
```
